title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode (build 20020416), the entire client area is redrawn N times.
EB: This behavior should be optimized so that there is at a maximum only one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the test case below.
2. Append N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times.
